meta.title: Gustaf Baltsar Garnow — Digital designer
meta.description: Digital designer who builds, tests, and shares work in public. Live projects, pauses, and lessons.

meta.keywords: digital designer, systems thinking, working in public, UX, interaction design, experimental design

lines: Digital designer. Build, test, move on.

clarificationStatement.heading: I work iteratively, not linearly.
clarificationStatement.body: Build, test, and delete without ego. What's here is what survived.

stack.attributes: ART DIRECTION · GAMING CULTURE · SYSTEMS THINKING · PRODUCT SENSE
